1545519505_13CFz29UuNbUx54HmLqQBfxPQNN2F.body:
Here is a simple shell script that helps randomly choosing from these public IDs: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1KGEnPA49Rg9ZRfptt1aRHea9xjSWGqiTD_0
Features: 
- automatically enables Multiuser plugin 
- copies a randomly chosen master seed to the clipboard 
- starts ZeroNet
- disables Multiuser plugin before exiting. 

_Feel free to do with it whatever you wish._
